@ scalaru, google physxloader.dll and download the dll file, extract the RAR file & copy & paste the dll file into either your System32 or your System folder, the info should come with it, if it asks for another dll file, then do the same thing with that, you will get it going.

How I (64 windows 7 high end PC) did it:
Install like usual
Crack like usual
And then in the install-folder you can find an physx update file, D:\Program Files (x86)\Payday The Heist\redist\Phys\PhysX_9.10.0513_SystemSoftware.exe for me, after that it worked, no crashes at all.
Theres a steam patch out that fixes all the issues, but no ones released a cracked patch yet..
Thank you for the upload, I had a few deal breaking doubts about the game but after grabbing this I realized it was amazing. Bought it right after, thank you again 10/10.

Game Works Great Here. 

1/ Installed and "DID NOT" have To Install The "PhysX_9.10.0513" Software cuz My System already have It.

Considering DirectX.. Some Asses On Here Thing They Got Win7 and Vista and Have No Reason to install DirectX9 Because Win7 is DX11 and Vista DX10

For The Peeps That have No Idea what Ur talking about > By Installing DX9 on Win7/Vista It DOES NOT Overwrite Your Version Of DX11/Dx10 ,, It Only Adds The Required .dll files That The Game Needs To Play. I have Created a Thread about This On Mininova back In the day ,, But seems Like Not Much care and Ignore , SO Suffer You Fools, if You have No Intentions Of Following Instructions

for those who get black screen, can try this.

1. Go to your installation folder
%Program Files\Payday The Heist\redist\PhysX

2. Run the PhysX_9.10.0513_SystemSoftware.exe

that's all. hope it works.
